name: Orbs (itch) (Storm Howard)
description:
Collect orbs, avoid and shoot spikes and get the highest score possible! 

Consider donating to help support future games, it really helps me out!

Features
  • Endless mode to get the highest score you possibly can!
  • Simple controls that can be used with one hand only!
  • Plenty of sounds and a soundtrack
  • Leader-board that lets you keep track of who's best!
  • Simple graphics that can run on almost anything
Controls

Move the mouse to move the player.
Left click to shoot.
Right click to use your ability (once the bar at the bottom is full).
Shift to slow down if needed.

How to play

Stay away from red and blue spikes, they hurt!
Collect orbs, they don't hurt!
Shoot orbs to get points, hit spikes to get even more points. Bonus points if you use your special ability.
